Name: Joya

Name: Joya
Review Text: I had nothing to complain about. We had a delicious 4 course meal with some on-the-spot wine recommendations. Slightly elevated ambience, nice atmosphere with some Amsterdam-typical industrial look elements. We felt very welcome and enjoyed …

Name: Joya
Review Text: Service on fleek, personal and professional. Beautifully presented dishes with seasonal products.  Great location for dinner or the most fabulous cocktails.

Name: Joya

Name: Joya
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic! The food is really wonderful. Also they have a very eclectic selection of wines from all over the world you can taste by glass. The atmosphere is as delicious as the food. And the top most is the staff, they were super with the kids and us. If you come to Amsterdam, try it out.

Name: Joya
Review Text: I loved the adventure of the surprise prix fixe menu, and the food was amazing! So well done. Don't skip the wine pairings. They were so unusual and well paired with each course. …

Name: Joya
Review Text: Amazing dishes, very unique and gastronomic. The price is really good for the quality of the dining experience. Service is great and very knowledgeable about the dishes they serve and the wines to pair. All in all, a great experience!

Name: Joya
Review Text: Joya combines the Thai, Japanese and French cuisine and that results in delicious food! My personal favorites are the Thai steak tartare, the crispy softshell crab and the Three Lions. The staff is very friendly and attentive. Joya is a perfect place for having full course dinner in good company.

Name: Joya
Review Text: Yes!! I am happy with this new spot in town. Delicious diner which I started with great oysters. The staff is very kind and professional. Love to go back there!! Great recommendation.

Name: Joya
Review Text: We had such a great evening of fine dining. Joya is a beautiful designed restaurant...eye candy! The service is top notch and the food is delicious.

Name: Joya
Review Text: The ambience is nice, not a vegetarian friendly place. The service was quite slow. Generally, the menu didn't have enough options, even for a non - vegetarian place. I was a bit disappointed!
